'''''Gymnopilus aculeatus''''' is a species of [[mushroom]] in the family [[Strophariaceae]]. Originally [[species description|described]] in 1951 as a species of ''[[Pholiota]]'', it was transferred to genus ''[[Gymnopilus]]'' by mycologist [[Rolf Singer]] in 1951.<ref name="Singer 1951"/>

==See also==
